data.event: The first European settlers came in 1840 in search of diamonds.
In 1882, it was elevated to the category of district and was called “Nossa Senhora do Carmo da Bagagem”.
In 1892 it became a vila (city) and in 1900 the name was changed to Monte Carmelo, after the mountain near Haifa.
